verses.name: Ezekiel 39:19
verses.text: And ye shall eat fat till ye be full, and drink blood till ye be drunken, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:20
verses.text: Thus ye shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:21
verses.text: And I will set my glory among the heathen, and all the heathen shall see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid upon them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:22
verses.text: So the house of Israel shall know that I am the Lord their God from that day and forward.
